ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “We've been fighting the Shinra
on this battlefield for a long time.”{PAUSE}“We've still settled in for
a long war with them.”{PAUSE}“Could you spare some time,
and help us fight them?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “All right then…
Take care of yourselves…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Really!? Then go on up and
they'll fill you in on the details.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “All right then…
Take care of yourselves…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Really!? Then go on up and
they'll fill you in on the details.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “All right then…
Take care of yourselves…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Really!? Then go on up and
they'll fill you in on the details.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “Let's see…head north along the coast,
keep going a ways and
you'll run into Junon.”{PAUSE}“But be alert because
it sits in the shadows of
a small hill.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Really!? Then go on up and
they'll fill you in on the details.”

dialogStrings:
“We've been fighting the Shinra
on this battlefield for a long time.”{PAUSE}“We've still settled in for
a long war with them.”{PAUSE}“Could you spare some time,
and help us fight them?”

“We don't want to sound pushy,
so if you're busy with something,
why don't you finish that first?”
{CHOICE}Where is Junon?
{CHOICE}We'll help you

“We don't want to sound pushy,
so if you're busy with something,
why don't you finish that first?”
{CHOICE}Like to help but…
{CHOICE}I guess we'll help

“We don't want to sound pushy,
so if you're busy with something,
why don't you finish that first?”
{CHOICE}I'm sorry…really
{CHOICE}All right, we'll help

“Let's see…head north along the coast,
keep going a ways and
you'll run into Junon.”{PAUSE}“But be alert because
it sits in the shadows of
a small hill.”

“All right then…
Take care of yourselves…”

“Really!? Then go on up and
they'll fill you in on the details.”
